nodes.description: 自杀式炸弹袭击者在医院后门引爆，为伪装成医生的外部袭击者进入创造条件
nodes.support_text: a suicide bomber blew himself up at the back entrance

nodes.description: 已进入医院的袭击者（包括熟悉环境的内部人员）立即发动枪击、手榴弹和刀具袭击
nodes.support_text: launched a killing spree with guns, grenades and knives immediately after the blast

nodes.description: 两位曾在此工作数月的实习生袭击者参与屠杀，其中一人自杀，另一人被特种部队击毙
nodes.support_text: two interns in their 20s who had worked in the facility for months... One of them blew himself up and the other was shot down by special forces

nodes.description: 袭击者针对VIP病房和普通病房实施差异化攻击，重点袭击军方人员及前政府官员亲属
nodes.support_text: raided nearly every floor... spared two wards... sought out an army general and the relative of a former minister

nodes.description: 袭击者使用近距离射击、刺杀病患和手榴弹轰炸等手段制造大规模伤亡，包括孕妇和儿童
nodes.support_text: stabbed bed-ridden patients, threw grenades into crowded wards... shooting victims in the head... a mother and a child in her arms

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国通过 Amaq 宣称负责袭击，但幸存者证词显示袭击者使用Pashto语喊口号
nodes.support_text: Islamic State group claimed it was behind the attack via Amaq... survivors said the attackers chanted 'Allahu Akbar' and 'Long live Taliban' in Pashto

nodes.description: 阿富汗军方承认袭击存在内外勾结，称内部人员协助为必然条件
nodes.support_text: the attack was carried out from both outside and inside... could not have been possible without the help of people inside

nodes.description: 西方消息源和幸存者称死亡人数超过100人，与军方公布的30人存在重大分歧
nodes.support_text: Western sources... said there were far more attackers and the death toll exceeded 100

nodes.description: 袭击者与遥控指挥者（称呼Mullah Sahib）保持实时通讯，明确标注‘消灭非穆斯林’
nodes.support_text: they addressed as Mullah Sahib... 'We are killing all the non-believers'

nodes.description: 哈卡尼网络被指为幕后黑手，因该组织与塔利班关系密切且具备复杂袭击能力
nodes.support_text: indications that the (Taliban-allied) Haqqani network was behind it
